doc.title: ...Nothing Happened
doc.plot: "..,nothing happened" is a story about perceptions. Hope comes across a video of her filmmaker boyfriend, Johnny, in bed with another woman. As she collects her emotions, Johnny walks in. Hope confronts him, as Johnny tries to calm the situation and profess his innocence. Nothing is as it seems, in this point-of-view (p.o.v.) digital short.

"..,nothing happened" is a story about perceptions. Hope comes across a video of her filmmaker boyfriend, Johnny, in bed with another woman. As she collects her emotions, Johnny walks in. Hope confronts him, as Johnny tries to calm the situation and profess his innocence. Nothing is as it seems, in this point-of-view (p.o.v.) digital short.
